conclusion: The maximum value of the electromotive force generated by an alternating current generator can be calculated using the formula: ε_m = m ⋅ ω ⋅ Φ_m
m is the number of turns of the coil, which is 100.
ω is the angular frequency, which is 10 rad/s.
Φ_m is the maximum value of the magnetic flux, which is 2.0 × 10^-7 Wb.
Substituting the given values into the formula, we get: ε_m = 100 ⋅ 10 ⋅ 2.0 × 10^-7 = 2.0 × 10^-5 V
The maximum value of the electromotive force generated by the alternating current generator is 2.0 × 10^-5 V.
